description: Detects the removal of Sysmon, which could be a potential attempt at defense evasion
author: frack113
false_positives: Legitimate administrators might use this command to remove Sysmon for debugging purposes
name: Uninstall Sysinternals Sysmon
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\Sysmon64.exe" OR "*\\Sysmon.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"System activity monitor")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\-u*" OR "*\/u*"))
